definition: to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study
to get the desired outcome/to win favor by fawning on sb/to curry favor with/a fruitful outcome to reward one's labor
to suppress by armed force/to send a punitive expedition against/to crusade against

sentences.english: Debt collectors buy old debts from companies or lenders for pennies on the dollar.
sentences.chinese: 債主從公司收舊賬或者跟債務人討小錢。

sentences.english: C. Discussion on Freshman English course for DFLL majors.
sentences.chinese: 有關檢討外文系大一英文課程案，提請討論。

sentences.english: She bummed a dollar off me.
I'm sorry, I can't do for you, can only be myself.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我做不到討沵歡喜，只能做我自己。

sentences.english: He would like every man at this table to believe that he makes love to me .
sentences.chinese: 他是在讓桌上的每個人都相信他在討我的歡心。

sentences.english: If you want to win Tom's heart， make him a cheesecake.
sentences.chinese: 若是你想討湯姆歡心，做起司蛋糕給他喫準沒錯。

sentences.english: He went to his neighbour to beg for some milk to feed the motherless baby.
sentences.chinese: 他找街坊鄰居討了一些牛奶來餵養那個沒孃的孩子。

sentences.english: Actors powder with their left hands for luck.
sentences.chinese: 演員們爲了討吉利而用左手搽粉。

sentences.english: Discuss the use of thrombolysis in acute thrombophlebitis.
sentences.chinese: 討血栓溶解治在急性血栓靜脈炎之角色。

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to manage amputation injuries and discuss the potential for reimplantation .
sentences.chinese: 有能處截肢性創傷與討再接合的可能性。

sentences.english: He married his son to an architect's daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他替兒子討了一個建築師的女兒做老婆。

sentences.english: "I cannot placate the Left, " he grumbles .
sentences.chinese: 他不滿地說，“我沒法討得左派的歡心”。

sentences.english: I conciliated her with a promise to take her out to dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我答應帶她去喫飯以討她的歡心。

sentences.english: Chapter 7 looks at attempts to coordinate stockpiling policies internationally .
sentences.chinese: 第七章將論討國際上協調庫存政策的嘗試。

sentences.english: She repeated the miser no hand to discuss wine.
sentences.chinese: 她屢次向吝嗇鬼討酒都沒到手。

sentences.english: Ah Liu suddenly entered with a woeful look and asked for a tip.
sentences.chinese: 阿劉忽然進來，哭喪着臉向他討小費。

definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to take the initiative/to do sth of one's own accord/spontaneous/active/opposite: passive 被動|被动[bei4 dong4]/drive (of gears and shafts etc)
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
